caption:
Let’s take a walk and talk Hormones…

We had the honor of having @christinawellness a Nutritional Therapy Practitioner and IIN Health Coach — live with our Head of Admissions Myisha Procter @thesequinunicorn they talked about Christina’s powerful journey and how she helps women balance their hormones and boost fertility without sacrificing joy or connection to life.

In this IG Live, Christina shares tips for balancing your hormones on your terms and how the HCTP program helped her build a practice that truly honors the whole person.
She busts a few myths including female cycles, cravings and the correlation between fruits and sugar intake. She also answered a few questions from our guests. 
 
✨ If you’re thinking of joining IIN, don’t miss this one — especially with the scholarship extension still available!
